WHAT RENTAL ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?

EXPECT MORE AND MAKE HOUSS YOUR HOME

With over 8000 units and 10 luxury estates to choose from

SHOW MORE
  • Luxury Collection
  • Lifestyle Collection
  • Student Accommodation

ABOUT US

Watch our video and be captivated by lifestyle living that leaves you expecting more

HEAR FROM OUR RESIDENTS

When it comes to finding a home and feeling at home, Houss rentals embodies its values and it shows and reflects in their customer service. Every member i have interacted with at their office has made the process so easy yet efficient, especially Tholakele Khuzwayo. They've made me feel like they put their customers (tenant) at the core of their business.
Busisiwe MsomiResident
I recently had the pleasure of interacting with Sherilyn Bodnar, the Utilities and Finance Administrator at Houss Rentals. I must say that her level of helpfulness and professionalism truly stood out. I reached out to Sherilyn to discuss a concern or two, and she was quick to respond and address all of my queries. Sherilyn's friendly and approachable demeanor made our interaction pleasant and stress-free. Sherilyn demonstrated exceptional patience, thoroughness, a high level of professionalism and maintained strict confidentiality when handling sensitive information. Overall, I can confidently say that Sherilyn Bodnar is an invaluable asset to Houss Rentals.
ShahrinaResident
The Precinct is a great estate for young families and professionals. The apartments are neat, well designed and modern. Our agent, Vuyo, is very welcoming and ensured that our move was seamless. From the admin office, Leonara assisted with our lease agreement and administration. Very efficient service. Highly recommended estate to live in.
Premlin NaidooResident
Amazing service received from Ayanda Mkhize at Crowthorne Lux apartments, he is the most helpful agent I have experienced. My move was smooth and had no glitches. Thank you Ayanda for your welcoming energy and splendid service
Saluse MahlatiResident
Would like to share my sincere gratitude to Miss Lavania Naicker and Miss Nhlanhla Mahlangu for the great service that they ushered us with,from securing a very good home at the parks lifestyle apartments…we really appreciate your kind and good service,looking forward to a healthy stay. Thank you so much once more
Carol MaringaResident
LEAVE A REVIEW
